short_summary: Dispose of about 10,000 expired medical personal protective equipment (MPPE) worth of acute incontinent care products
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-02-23 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  The Strategic Medical Countermeasures Program requires the services of a Contractor for the disposal of expired medical personal protective equipment (MPPE) products stored at the Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED), Garrison Petawawa and/or Olymbec Warehouse, Pembroke, ON. See Annex A for more information.   The MPPE must be disposed of on or before March 31, 2023.   Canada intends to award one contract to meet this requirement.
full_summary:
Government of Canada 
Tender for Disposal of Expired Medical Personal Protective Equipment (MPPE)

**Project Title and Announcement Information**

* **Notice Reference Number:** WS3855498046-Doc3855600059
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-02
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-23T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 2

** procurement Information **

* ** Procurement Category:** SRV
* ** Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* ** Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR), Petawawa

**Contract Requirements**

The Department of National Defence requires the services of a Contractor for the disposal of expired medical personal protective equipment (MPPE) products stored at the Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED), Garrison Petawawa and/or Olymbec Warehouse, Pembroke, ON. The MPPE must be disposed of on or before March 31, 2023. 

The Canadian Government intends to award one contract to meet this requirement. Contractors interested in providing services should submit their proposals by February 23, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Proposals submitted after this time will be declared as non-responsive.

**Important Dates**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-02-28
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-03-31

**Contact Information**
Denbeigh, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC)
andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Resources**

The detailed tender description, contact information, and additional resources can be accessed through the bid solicitation notice found on the [Buyandsell](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15305575?extsite=MTUzMDU1NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) platform.  Please find attached more information on [Annex A](Annex A).

Please note that you should read the attached files carefully to ensure you have all necessary information to bid. Contact Andrew Denbeigh at andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  for more information.
